110.movie_plot: When Joan Wilder is abducted while on a trip along the Nile, her boyfriend, Jack Colton, and pal Ralph rush to rescue her and retrieve a fabled jewel.

77.movie_plot: A struggling dentist's life is turned upside down when a famous gangster moves in next door, and his wife convinces him to inform a notorious mob boss about the gangster's whereabouts.

194.movie_plot: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler...but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

75.movie_plot: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

76.movie_plot: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

39.movie_plot: Investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

176.movie_plot: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a troubled marriage while her stepsister gets engaged.

107.movie_plot: A lonely and disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.

69.movie_plot: Simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet; he uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

147.movie_plot: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

4.movie_plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

58.movie_plot: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

29.movie_plot: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

162.movie_plot: The original '70s T.V. family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.

112.movie_plot: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from its manager.

139.movie_plot: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number one patient is an insecure mob boss.

135.movie_plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

87.movie_plot: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

1.movie_plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

164.movie_plot: Zookeepers struggle to deal with the policies of changing directors.

193.movie_plot: A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.

64.movie_plot: Paulie, a talking parrot, recounts his travels looking for his original owner to a Russian janitor who helps him to the end of his journey.

120.movie_plot: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

167.movie_plot: A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun. Can Ted Striker save the day and get the shuttle back on track - again?

104.movie_plot: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

24.movie_plot: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

148.movie_name: Shanghai Triad (Yao a yao yao dao waipo qiao) (1995)
148.movie_plot: A provincial boy related to a Shanghai crime family is recruited by his uncle into cosmopolitan Shanghai in the 1930s to be a servant to a ganglord's mistress.

113.movie_plot: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

131.movie_plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

52.movie_name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999)
52.movie_plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

98.movie_plot: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

189.movie_name: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit (1993)
189.movie_plot: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.

25.movie_plot: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

156.movie_plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

184.movie_plot: On her deathbed, a mother makes her son promise never to get married, which scars him with psychological blocks to a commitment with his girlfriend. They finally decide to tie the knot in ...

19.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

93.movie_plot: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther, Bagheera, and free spirited bear, Baloo.

51.movie_plot: A shy reclusive lady is convinced by an invisible entity to sing. Subsequently, she finds herself noticed by a sleazy talent agent and her talent being showcased on-stage. She also meets a kind but nervous man who becomes her best friend.

3.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

127.movie_plot: A group of good-hearted but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.

95.movie_plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that he is not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

21.movie_plot: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

180.movie_plot: John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, just as its new female owner catches Max's attention.

134.movie_plot: Two hapless freight handlers find themselves encountering Dracula, the Frankenstein Monster and the Wolf Man.

108.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

124.movie_plot: A sheltered young high society woman joins the United States Army on a whim and finds herself in a more difficult situation than she ever expected.

146.movie_plot: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

54.movie_plot: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

101.movie_plot: The romantic and chivalrous adventures of adopted bastard Tom Jones in 18th century England.

159.movie_plot: The remake of the 1970 Neil Simon comedy follows the adventures of a couple, Henry and Nancy Clark, vexed by misfortune while in New York City for a job interview.

32.movie_plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

182.movie_plot: The love lives of two brothers, Mickey and Francis, interconnect as Francis cheats on his wife with Mickey's ex-girlfriend, while Mickey impulsively marries a stranger.

71.movie_plot: A perfect red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

188.movie_name: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold (1994)
188.movie_plot: one year after their first western adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.

166.movie_plot: When two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.
